Title: Live Flesh
Writer: Pedro Almodóvar (screenplay), Jorge Guerricaechevarría (screenplay), Ray Loriga (screenplay), Ruth Rendell (novel)
Actors: Javier Bardem, Francesca Neri, Liberto Rabal, Ángela Molina
Plot: Pizza delivery man Victor is having an argument with Elena, whom he met a few days ago, but she was high then and doesn't want to hear about him. Reacting to the noise, two cops, young David and older Sancho, arrive at the scene, the gun accidentally goes off.. Four years later David is a wheelchair basketball star, he's married to Elena, Victor is released out of prison and their destinies begin to cross again.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 11 wins & 13 nominations.
